Header: Schools in Sabaragamuwa to be re-opened on Monday
Content: Schools in Sabaragamuwa province will be re-opened on the 5th of June. Moreover, 14 schools in Nivitigala Zone would be re-opened on June 6th. Meanwhile, all schools in Western and Southern provinces, except 39 schools in South, which were damaged or being used as camps, will be re-opened on June 05th.
